commit.message:
unroll.c (find_splittable_givs): After express_from, call replace_rtx to convert dest_reg to new_reg.

        * unroll.c (find_splittable_givs): After express_from, call replace_rtx
        to convert dest_reg to new_reg.

From-SVN: r25056
